name: red beans
author: mookman288
description: Red Beans is an affordable and delicious stew often served with buttered white rice, bread, and hot sauce

ingredients.ingredient: red kidney or small red beans

recipe: Simmer the &$0 with &$1 and &$2 in a large pot on medium-high heat for one hour, adding water as necessary
Add half of the &$4 to a skillet on medium heat and fry &$3 until browned, set aside
Dice &$5, &$6, and &$7, and fry until browned with the remaining &$4
Mince &$8 and add to the skillet for 1 minute
Add &$9, &$10, and &$11 to the skillet for 30 seconds
Add skillet contents to the large pot and cook for two hours or until the beans are tender
Smash one cup of the Red Beans and re-add to the pot
Add &$3, &$14, and &$15 to the Red Beans and serve
